original_text: Why then did you not obey the voice of the Lord? Why did you pounce on the spoil and do what was evil in the sight of the Lord?”
korean_text: 어찌하여 왕이 여호와의 목소리를 청종하지 아니하고 탈취하기에만 급하여 여호와께서 악하게 여기시는 일을 행하였나이까

sentences.original_text: Why then did you not obey the voice of the Lord?
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 어째서 당신은 주의 음성에 순종하지 않았습니까?

sentences.original_text: Why did you pounce on the spoil
and do what was evil in the sight of the Lord?”
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 보시기에 악한 일을 행했습니까?
